src:
Sporočilo uredništvom - novinarska konferenca poslancev SDS Černača in Mahniča

06 Nov 2019, 08:54


Ljubljana, 6. novembra - Novinarska konferenca poslancev SDS Zvoneta Černača in Žana Mahniča, na kateri bosta spregovorila o predlogu zakona o stanovanjski jamstveni shemi, ki predstavlja odziv na ukrep Banke Slovenije o zaostrovanju pogojev za potrošniške kredite, bo danes ob 13. uri v sobi 54/T v DZ na Šubičevi 4, so sporočili iz poslanske skupine SDS.
text:
Message to the editors - Press conference of SDS deputies Cernac and Mahnic

06 Nov 2019, 08:54


Ljubljana, 6 November - Press conference of SDS deputies Zvoneta Černac and Jean Mahnic to discuss a bill on a housing guarantee scheme, which is a response to the Bank of Slovenia's measure on tightening consumer credit conditions, will be in the room today at 1 pm 54 / T in the National Assembly on Subiceva 4, the SDS deputy group said.
